channel.title: TechBytes with Tina & Dave
channel.itunes:author: Faustina and David
channel.description: Conversations about AI, cybersecurity, and emerging technologies.

item.title: Why Social Media feels Different!
item.description: In this episode, David and Tina discusses how the social media landscape has evolved over the years. A technology that once promised to connect people has transformed into a complex web of algorithms, targeted ads, and data tracking. We explore the implications of these changes on user experience, privacy, and mental health. Listen in to learn more!

item.title: How the Internet Tracks You (and What You Can Do About It)
item.description: In this episode, we discuss how the internet tracks you in ways most people never notice. We unpack what really happens when you click “accept cookies,” explore the invisible world of tracking pixels, and explain how fingerprinting can identify your device even after you clear your history. We also break down those 'magical' moments when ads feel like they’re reading your mind. From what your phone quietly shares, to how apps follow you across devices, to why “free” platforms often cost you your data. If you have ever wondered how much the digital world actually sees, this is the episode you do not want to miss.

item.title: How to Stay Safe in the Age of AI
item.description: In this episode, we discuss the growing concerns around AI safety and what individuals can do to protect themselves. We discuss cybersecurity threats, such as, the exploitation of software supply chains and how subtle it can be. We also discuss latest threats events and how companies can learn from them.

item.title: Has the iPhone Peaked: Discussing Tech Events this Fall
item.description: In this episode, David and Faustina dive into the latest tech headlines — from the launch of the iPhone 17 and Meta’s new Ray-Ban glasses to the latest updates from Anthropic’s Claude. They ask the big questions: Has the smartphone industry reached its peak? And is Apple still innovating, or just refining? Tune in for a lively and thoughtful chat about where tech is headed next.

item.title: Is AI really creative?
item.description: In this episode, we explore the concept of creativity in artificial intelligence. We discuss what creativity means, its different levels and how AI systems can exhibit creative behaviors. We also discuss the subtle effect AI has on our creative abilities and how to stay ahead of the curve.

item.title: The impact of AI in our society today
item.description: In this episode, Tina and Dave dive into how artificial intelligence is shaping everyday life, particularly regarding education. We explore both the opportunities AI creates and the challenges it raises for ethics, privacy, and the future of human connection.

item.title: Is AI replacing my job?
item.description: In this episode, we explore how AI is impacting jobs across industries, what roles are most at risk, and where humans remain essential.
